amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS \ SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for the American Community Survey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in the bill for the Census Bureau's American Community Survey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Paul.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
